content: 2cash is the Crypto-Commerce company that provides a hybrid blockchain network for cryptocurrency and NFT's integrated into a full ecosystem that facilitates transactions for trading, remittance, e-commerce and much more.2cash eliminates traditional transaction fees plus pays members to trade cryptocurrency plus other features not found on other platforms.TWOERC20100,000,000https://ico.2cash.io
